main.title: Hi, I'm Simon.
main.subtitle: I'm a full stack developer who does shit for funks.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Here you can find additional stuff before I come up with better text

whoAmI.title: Who am I?
blocks: I'm a programmer, mentor, information management & economics major, obstacle course racer, marathon runner, captain and boulderer.
I originate from the picturesque village of Sloup in Moravian Karst, Czechia, and I've been living in Brno since 2018.
I am passionate about all things JavaScript, test driven development.
I am also a blog writer that I write either to learn (Feynman technique) or remember interesting things I've encountered during my career/hobbies.

experience.content: Level.works is a Rotterdam based company that connects flexible workers (freelancers) with companies. During my stay here, I've leveraged React, React Native, Some other shit and a bunch of other items that I need to write here

LOGEX is an Amsterdam based company that helps medical facilities get insight into their data. During my stay, I've been part of a company that has grown from 40 people across 2 countries to 300 people across 6 countries. I've been responsible for technical leadership of a product, as well as developing internal framework used by 60 developers, and I've helped the company with rebranding their product twice.

Green Fox Academy is a hungarian company with a branch office in Czechia. When I was mentoring here, I was one of very few mentors whose students had 100 % success when finishing their final exams, as well as receiving their jobs within 2 weeks of finishing the bootcamp.
